segments.text: Good morning , you look very tired .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I nearly didn't sleep last night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you hold a party or something else yesterday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I just watched Supergirl , and it began too late in the night . I was too excited to get asleep after one o'clock .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't like this program , because there are too many constant arguments between the judges .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The contestants are different . These girls perform in free styles .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have much time watching TV ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think less than 3 hours . This year I didn't watch any entertainment programs . Too many ads between the programs . I prefer listening to the radio .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't like ads , either . But ads could bring big profits to the TV station .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If they could make beautiful ads , I could bear .
segments.speaker: S2
